Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2009 05:25AM penny54 wrote: I also had cording under my arm pit running through my forearm after my lumpectomy and SNB.  Went for therapy to stretch everything out in 2005.  Had PBM with DIEP reconstruction last summer and needed to go back for therapy once again.  Even though I stretch and do range of motion exercises daily, I just had some scar revisions and fat injections and once again am returning to my wonderful OT  for hopefully a final stretching.  I do watch for LE and did have some mild swelling in my chest and breast after my lumpectomy and radiation.  My OT taught me some massage techniques that helped. Penny
Posts.Title: Eeek - a CORD! I'm freaking out... Kleenex knowledgeforpower
